name: hail2u.net
description: This website publishes articles and documents about a web development.
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://kyonagashima.com/)

scripts.postcomic: npm run html && npm run deploy
scripts.postcontribute: npm run html && npm run deploy
scripts.precss: npm run test_css && npm run clear
scripts.postcss: cd dist && rm -fr css/ && mkdir css && cd .. && cp -rTu src/css/ dist/css/ && rm dist/css/test.html && cp -rTu tmp/ dist/css/ && cp tmp/main.min.css src/partial/css.mustache && node bin/style-guide.js
scripts.deploy: cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message="Build" && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.prejs: npm run test_js && npm run clear
scripts.postjs: cd dist && rm -fr js/ && mkdir js && cd .. && cp -rTu src/js/ dist/js/ && cp -rTu tmp/ dist/js/
scripts.postnonfiction: npm run html && npm run deploy
scripts.postnovel: npm run html && npm run deploy
scripts.rebuild: npm run css && npm run img && npm run js && npm run html && node bin/html.js --all
scripts.postsnapshot: npm run html && npm run deploy
scripts.test: npm run test_css && npm run test_js
scripts.postupdate: npm run html && npm run deploy
scripts.postversion: git push origin master --tags && npm run deploy
scripts.postwebpage: npm run html && npm run deploy
